default.text: There are way too many mis-matched pairs of socks in here, but that's a future me problem.
I don't think it's wise to go through your mate's clo- is that my underwear?
Don't let the lack of asset variety deceive you; that bed is not made.
I like to keep these boxes around for when I have to move out.
I should take out the trash, but that's also a future me problem.
